Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to a mechanical problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to a mechanical problem on the train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
